channel.title: Delta ::setlevel

item.title: Delta ::setlevel
item.dc:creator: @ServerPKisfun ServerPKisfun
item.description:
@ServerPKisfun wrote:

These go into PI command when you do ::master it makes it so you cant do it if u have equpitment on or in wild. how would i convert these to delta?

if (c.inWild()) { return; }

for (final int element : c.playerEquipment) { if (element > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; }

Read full topic
